name: replaceOccurrences(of:with:options:range:)
desc: Replaces all occurrences of a given string in a given range with another given string, returning the number of replacements.
declaration:
func replaceOccurrences(of target: String, 
                   with replacement: String, 
                options: NSString.CompareOptions = [], 
                  range searchRange: NSRange) -> Int
